data.message: Ok but did u wear them? Btw? I took care of your grandma in the hospital. She showed me pictures of you guys in her house at Xmas. She was so nice and I enjoyed having her as my patient.

replies.message: Wouldn't say that if I were you. HIPAA bitches will nab your ass for that.

Kristina Chase excuse me but I didnt give out any names or any details. do you honestly work healthcare??????? if you did , you would know that I am perfectly fine. the man in the moon couldve been her also??? she wanted everyone to know. she was TELLING EVERYONE. Infact I thought the woman was lying until she showed me on her tablet. plus??? this was way before hippa came out, this was way back in the early 2000s
Kimberly Mccord this is why i never reply or look back on my comments...( idiots everywhere, lol)
